body: I know lots of you are mad at me for pvp logging or hackusating, but since my ban, I've had a while to think things over and I've decided to change my ways! I will not pvp log or hackusate. I will make nice comments or no comments at all. I get unbanned tomorrow and i will be glad to see all of you on. I deserved that ban for all my infractions and I will promise to change! I will see you all later, Thanks... :P
body_tagged: I know lots of you are mad at me for pvp logging or hackusating, but since my ban, I've had a while to think things over and I've decided to change my ways! I will not pvp log or hackusate. I will make nice comments or no comments at all. I get unbanned tomorrow and i will be glad to see all of you on. I deserved that ban for all my infractions and I will promise to change! I will see you all later, Thanks... :P
title: My Infractions

I hope to see you on, as well :D

replies.body:
Next time, please keep on topic to the conversation, as this post isn't designed for conversation about your ban or his ban or his hacks in any way. 
This topic is dedicated to ChampionCreeper, either give him some encouragement or some constructive criticism please. 

Hey Champion, hope you learned your lesson! ;) 
I'll be seeing you in-game! :D
